text: Watashi wa anata ni meiji rareta koto igai wa, kesshite kare-ra ni tsugemasen. “Watashi no omodeari, anata gata no omode ara reru arrā ni tsukae nasai. ” (To iu igai ni wa) watashi ga kare-ra no naka ni ita ma wa, watashi wa kare-ra no shōnindearimashita. Anata ga watashi o o yobi ni natta nochi wa, anata ga kare-ra no kanshi-shadeari, mata anata wa, subete no koto no risshō-sha de ara remasu
